sections.heading: university, state college, or community college; procedures, rules, and regulations
sections.text: Each state university, state college, or community college shall adopt and promulgate the procedures, rules, and regulations necessary to carry out the First Responder Recruitment and Retention Act.SourceLaws 2016, L

85-2622.State university, state college, or community college; procedures, rules, and regulations.

Each state university, state college, or community college shall adopt and promulgate the procedures, rules, and regulations necessary to carry out the First Responder Recruitment and Retention Act.

SourceLaws 2016, LB906, ยง 4;Laws 2023, LB727, ยง 111;R.S.1943, (2024), ยง 85-2604;Laws 2025, LB608, ยง 15.Effective Date: September 3, 2025
